spatial_accuracy.notes: Major mismatch between 2D and 3D. The 2D plan is essentially one large open space (kitchen top-left, dining top-right, living right) with a stair zone bottom-left and a small central bathroom, plus a single entrance at bottom-center. The 3D render instead shows multiple enclosed rooms (including what reads as a bedroom) and a central corridor/stair core, breaking the intended open-plan layout. Wall locations and room placements do not align with the 2D boundaries. Door and window positions do not correspond to the plan’s openings. Overall proportions and zoning (left/right split and central bathroom placement) are not preserved.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency relationships are incorrect: kitchen/dining/living are not represented as the large connected spaces shown in 2D. The bathroom is not embedded/positioned as the small centered block with the same access points. Multiple additional partitions create rooms not in the plan, and several planned openings (entrance and wall windows) are not faithfully reproduced. Wall thickness looks visually consistent in 3D but fidelity to the plan’s structure is very low.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture does not map to the 2D plan (which shows only kitchen counters/appliances and minimal fixtures). The 3D includes bedroom and other furnishings not specified. Scales look plausible internally, but they are not accurate to the provided 2D layout.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Render is clean and visually clear with coherent lighting and generally consistent geometry. Isometric-style view is acceptable (slight perspective present). However, because the architectural content diverges heavily from the 2D plan, the presentation does not compensate for verification purposes.

detected_errors.description: Missing/incorrect representation of the large open-plan kitchen+dining area along the top of the 2D plan.
Missing/incorrect representation of the large living room occupying the right side per the 2D plan.
Bathroom location/shape does not match the small centered bathroom block shown in the 2D plan.
Bathroom access/door configuration differs from the 2D plan (door placement/orientation not matching the shown openings).
Stair placement and surrounding wall layout do not align with the 2D stair zone in the bottom-left quadrant.
Main entrance position at the bottom-center wall is not faithfully placed/represented as in the 2D plan.
Window placement does not match the 2D plan’s distribution (top wall openings, bottom wall windows, and right wall windows are inconsistent in count/position).
Room proportions and zoning are distorted: the 3D divides the footprint into several smaller rooms rather than preserving the 2D plan’s large continuous spaces.
Hallucinated rooms/partitions: the 3D render introduces an apparent bedroom and additional enclosed areas not present in the 2D plan.
Hallucinated furniture and interior program elements (e.g., bedroom furniture and extra cabinetry) not indicated in the 2D plan.
